price: Ninamara gutunganya indemo y’umubiri wiwe, nkamuhuhiramwo n’inkomoko y’ubuzima “Roho” akaba muzima, muraheza rero mumuhe icubahiro kimukwiye mu kumwubamira[10]”.
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: [10] Ukwubama kuvugwa ng’aha, kwari mu ntumbero yo guha Adamu icubahiro yahawe n’Imana Allah Yamuremye, ntikwari mu ntumbero yo kumusenga kuko ubwislamu bubuza bwivuye inyuma ukwubama mu ntumbero yo guha icubahiro umuntu.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
